entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this morning. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near the water this morning. Wind becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late this evening except gusting to 60 near the water late this evening and overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 08:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
